title: Clips
description: A dynamic Angular web app for seamless video uploading, organization, and playback.

title: Vidly
description: A React-based movie rental application showcasing CRUD operations, state management, and routing.

title: Beatmaker
description: An interactive JavaScript-based beat-maker featuring customizable sounds like kick, snare, and hi-hat.

title: Photon
description: Photon is a JavaScript image viewer using Pixels API. It features infinite scrolling and a modern UI.

title: Snake Game
description: A classic Snake Game built with Java Swing and AWT, featuring all the traditional gameplay mechanics.

title: To Do List
description: A JavaScript-based to-do list application with features to add, delete, filter, and mark tasks as done.
